TEXT.S: Forest Ablenalecuhan i American, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Forest Able i 1976 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 3 ku uwac atu silsil 20, namapili' tu nu Syracuse Nationals putiput putiput. 7 bulad 27 demiad, 1932 a mihca, Forest Able, miunduay.
